professional_summary: Experienced SQL Database Administrator with expertise in database management, performance tuning, security, and high availability solutions. Skilled in data integration and ETL processes.

key_responsibilities: Provided full database support for the Department of Education (DOE) contract on production and development environments.
Supported critical ED.gov site and maintained MS SQL 2012
Remediated security findings from FISMA and monthly scans
overseeing 30 vendor patch installations/reconfigurations per year.
Configured fail-over clustering using SQL Server 2008/2005 and log shipping for reporting purposes.
Developed and deployed ETL packages using SSIS
